Articles.Content: Congratulations to Kyasarinn! After a vote amongst the developers you’ve won the Valentina’s Day contest! We’ll be in contact with you and the runners up soon to get you your prizes.
Congrats! that really is such a great picture, describes them both so well. I hope they work together well.

NOO I DIDN'T WIN!

But seriously, I'm kind of sad that Greg or me didn't win.
Congrats Kyasarinn!
Kyasarinn is such a good artist! Great work, congrats! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> 
> NOO I DIDN'T WIN!
> But seriously, I'm kind of sad that Greg or me didn't win.

Mine wasn't *that* good. Although I did have at least a little expectation of being a runner-up.

I just know that the devs laughed when they saw my first entry.

In fact, maybe they were coding and skipped a line to create "The Rain Bug."

(But I'm still holding on to my second.)
This was by far my favorite, congratulations, Kyasarinn! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

She is going to be so happy to find out she won!!! I'm happy for her since she did more than one entry and I really like that colored pencil drawing. My first thought when I saw it was how Jeb would look really nice next to my Lisa Simpson tattoo. I love the colors how they're so bright and pretty. And the mouth expressions too; I love to zoom in when they do those funny things with their mouths. She really captured that nicely ![^_^](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_happy.png)
Congrats! S/he deserved it; that's a ridiculously cute picture!
Excellent! How was this done? Looks like a home grown chalk pastel.
![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)Congrats!

Ooooooooh my Gosh!! This is the biggest honor I could ever got, seriously. I don't know but I felt that contest was very important to me. Heh since it's reason why I decided to join here to the forum. I drawing Kerbals from some time, they are adorable creatures. Gosh I didn't really believe I could win. There was so many good entries. These was.... The most Kerbalsh (XD) day in my life ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) I got my own plushie Kerbal and won the contest. I honestly waited for the results soo long. I was little lost in time difference so there was free times I thought "there is one hour left". And I saw the second and third place. I thought "o my god... I haven't chance...." And waited for video. It was hard to me becouse it was 1:30 a.m in my time. And there was started. I watched, watched... And felt soo sleepy. I said to my (I was in my phone so I had to turn off video for while) "I can't. I go to sleep... If you will watch this to end, notify me if I won". And then he said "You won." I told to hem "please be serious". "No, really he showing yours picture" sweet Mother of God I forgot I was sleepy. Haha I woke up my mum and dad and said "I WON I WON!!" It was very very late but we was all so happy >w< i couldn't sleep to 4 a.m becouse of BIGBIGBIIG HAPPINESS.

Thank you guys for every nice comment. You made the wonderful warm felling in my little heart. You're wonderful. And Dear guys from SQUAD.... You made me so special. It's really the biggest honour for me. It was a big big honor when you featured my picture in Facebbok I didn't expect I could win..... Wow.... Thank you, I really want to hug everyone from the team seriously. It made my cry of happiness. I really don't know what's to say.... Really. You proved me that dreams comes true. 

You all from this forum are amazing. I'm really enjoy to being here and drawing Kerbals. For sure you will se a lot of fan arts from me. 

One more time - THANK YOU, THANK YOU EVERYONE!!!

ee sorry for my English it's early morning, I should still sleep but I think I can't XD

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> Excellent! How was this done? Looks like a home grown chalk pastel.

Forgot to reply you - I used simply colored pencils to draw it ^^ KOOH-I-NOOR Polycolor ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-02-28T06:45:20Z" title="02/28/2015 06:45  AM" data-short="9 yr">February 28, 2015</time> by Kyasarinn**

> > Congratulations to Kyasarinn! After a vote amongst the developers youÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ve won the ValentinaÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s Day contest! WeÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ll be in contact with you and the runners up soon to get you your prizes. > XD that's really good the smashed car in the background got me! Some kerbal driving their car to work when a ship capsule comes flying down! Well I guess it would happen a lot of you were a kerbal.

Like Hancook said.

"GoodJob!"
Okay now I have a strange desire to replicate that scene in KSP when 1.0 comes out.......
Congrats Kyasarinn, well deserved ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Continuing in the fine tradition of making me feel ashamed at my own lack of artistry.

Fantastic work, congratulations on winning, Kyasarinn ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
Congrats Kyasarinn, love the "Rapid Unscheduled Accident" artwork ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

> 
> Congrats Kyasarinn, love the "Rapid Unscheduled Accident" artwork ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

That wasn't an accident. Jeb, not having any great pickup lines, decided to go for a memorable first impression instead.

Yes, ever since I heard about Valentina, I could not help but picture her as Jebediah's kind of girl. We can only assume she'll be as badS=true as him, seeing as she'll be just as #BADA55.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-02T20:42:57Z" title="03/02/2015 08:42  PM" data-short="9 yr">March 2, 2015</time> by jarmund**
Yay! Exobiologists now have a whole new gender of *Kerbalus Awesomeness* Ã¢â‚¬â€¹to study!
And yet the new Kerbal looks nothing like her.. They just slapped a ponytail on a male kerbal and called it a day. rofl

> 
> And yet the new Kerbal looks nothing like her.. They just slapped a ponytail on a male kerbal and called it a day. rofl

If you look closely, she has a rounder, thinner face. THat's the big thing. Long hair is impractical in space, and none of the male Kerbals have more than really short hair. She does also have eyelashes
